headline.main: Burma Position Held Grave With No News From Rangoon; POSITION IN BURMA VIEWED AS GRAVE

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 28 -- There was ominously emphatic silence here today about fighting on the Burma front where, according to last reports, the British Imperial troops had retired along the Sittang River after inflicting heavy losses on the advancing Japanese. Up to a late hour tonight there was no news made public about fighting on the Burma land front or of the latest exploits of the American Volunteer Group or R.A.F. fliers.
abstract: Jap rept on Allied losses, Burma
